languages.text: "Если дух машины говорит на языке техножрецов, может, обойдемся без этого старика?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
languages.original_text: "Если дух машины говорит на языке техножрецов, может, обойдемся без этого старика?"

traits.locale_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"
"If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

languages.text: 「機械精霊が技術司祭の言葉を話すのなら、そもそもこの男は必要なのか？」
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: 「機械精霊が技術司祭の言葉を話すのなら、そもそもこの男は必要なのか？」

languages.text: “如果这个机魂会说技术神甫的语言，那我们还需要这个老人吗？”
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: “如果这个机魂会说技术祭司的语言，那我们还需要这个老人吗？”

languages.text: « Si l'esprit de la machine parle la langue des technoprêtres, nous n'avons pas besoin de l'aide du vieil homme, si ? »
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: « Si l'esprit de la machine parle la langue des technoprêtres, nous n'avons pas besoin de l'aide du vieil homme, si ? »

languages.text: «Si el espíritu máquina habla un idioma de tecnosacerdotes, ya no necesitamos a este anciano, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: «Si el espíritu máquina habla un idioma de tecnosacerdotes, ya no necesitamos a este anciano, ¿no?».

languages.text: "Wenn der Maschinengeist eine Techpriester-Sprache spricht, brauchen wir den alten Mann dann überhaupt?"
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn der Maschinengeist eine Techpriester-Sprache spricht, brauchen wir den alten Mann dann überhaupt?"

languages.text: "Makine ruhu, Tekno Rahiplerin dilini konuşabiliyorsa ihtiyara ihtiyacımız var mı ki?"
languages.original_text: "If the machine spirit speaks a Tech-Priest language, do we even need the old man?"

traits.locale_text: "Makine ruhu, bir Tekno Rahip'in dilini konuşabiliyorsa, ihtiyara ihtiyacımız var mı ki?"
